title: Reaching mastery lvl 7 with a champion should give you a summoner icon of that champion.
body:
The icon can be a literal cutout from the champions base splash art.
Some of these would make fine icons already : {{champion:268}}  {{champion:30}}  {{champion:10}}  {{champion:119}} {{champion:53}}

replies.body: I'd be down. I've been hoping for a while now that they'd make some more champion based icons. The ones we have are cool, but they're mostly based on skins rather than the champ.
Champion icons are of the few icons I would actually pay for.  Like back when I was maining Diana, I wanted the season 3 Diana icon so badly.  I got it!{{champion:131}}
good old days when you could actually main diana and get out with it :D
Buff Diana pls!
I miss bruiser jungle diana. :(
I still play it.  I think my average is 9/4/5 or something.

Nice upvote farming. 

Ofc they will never do it. If it existed, everybody will use it instead of the shop icons. It kills diversity and reduces income for riot from rp. 
"Oh i see you have Kennen as your profile pic, you like playing Kennen? How very interesting! I would never have guessed!" (Hint: it's fucking right there in everybody's profile page). 
There is no point in it. Sry to be a buzzkill, but this is the most logical answer as to why it will never happen. 

Bring on the downvotes, I don't fucking care.

I somehow doubt he posted this in order to receive nonexistent internet points that have literally no use or purpose. I think he just wanted to suggest an idea he thought was cool and wanted to see happen. Obviously it most likely won't happen, but if he didn't suggest it, then it DEFINITELY won't happen. 

The worst Riot can do is say no

Mastery 8 and above can unlock skin icons of that champ as well, updated with each new skin of course. Then it's like "Oh your fave champ doesnt have an ultimate skin? Just master it and bam, now ANY skin is ultimate skin!" (kinda) lol

First thing's first, i think Riot is doing some work to allow us to customize our own profile pages with our own splash art of choice. Or that's how i interpreted it from a Rioter saying they'll put in a word to the team who is developing these features.

As for new mastery levels and rewards, i also think Riot has a few new things in mind but aren't ready to talk about yet. This sounds like a cool idea but i think we can make it even better, no?
I would assume they had plans for the background on profile because if you check the mode on the background art, it says dynamic so I would assume there will be more modes coming out.

It says dynamic when it is dynamic, showing a champion that you've played a lot recently (in theory, although the dynamic profile messes up sometimes).
But if you equip an icon from an ultimate skin (Pulsefire Ezreal, Spirit Guard Udyr, DJ Sona, or Elementalist Lux), then your profile will be that ultimate skin, and the mode will say static.
{{champion:82}}

honestly, Imo. I think currently Mastery lvl 7 is perfect. 
Its really not that hard to get as long as you put a little work into it. 

I think champ icons should be a higher level reward. Give it to people who truly know the inside and out of that champ. 
It would make it an actual prize to those who put a lot of effort and practice into the champ and they would get to show off to everyone, "hey, look what i got from all my sweat and tears"

Honestly, the champion icon for mastery 7 is literally the easiest thing to do for the devs to implement and it would also be the most rewarding for the players.

I still don't get what are they waiting to implement it.

actually think this is a bad idea, people already dislike icons with champs faces because it's psycological warfare, if you see someone playing lets say god fist lee sin, has the rank 7 icon, you KNOW he's rank 7 before the game even starts, so your decisions are influenced, thats why you can't see enemy masteries, why would you get a special icon for something that's supposed to be unknown til the game starts and they get a kill?
I want the chinese Icons.

Nor are they tied to mastery anymore. What you get in their place now is a loot box with a skin for that hero guaranteed inside (along with 3 other random things).

Would be even greater if the icon could be one of choice from the existing skins. Or simply all icons from existing skins once the skin is owned.
They have themselves made icons collectibles, so why not making the cutouts from any skin splashart available as a reward when reaching level 7.

Or classic skin when reaching level 7, and a skin splash icon when reaching level 8 (whenever that happens).

What'd be even better is if the icon granted an animation alongside the Mastery 7 animation. Like if you got the badge with the wings, but behind it is the icon of your champion (but only if you're currently using it).
Getting a Pentakill with {{champion:18}} and C-6'ing with her, for example. Doing that would pretty much feel like, and declare to the enemy team that, I DID THAT. I NOW ASSERT MY DOMINANCE!
There would be so much toxicity if a Veigar did that XD
